name: fusionauth
description: FusionAuth is an authentication and identity management platform built for developers. It supports passwordless login, OAuth, SSO, and roles. Available as a self-hosted service or managed cloud, with a powerful dashboard and API.
features: Authentication: Identity management platform, Passwordless login, OAuth and SSO. Developer-friendly auth solution.
Role Management: Granular permissions. Flexible access control.
Dashboard: Powerful admin interface. Easy management.
API-First: Built for developers. Complete integration.
Self-Hosted or Cloud: Choose your deployment. Flexible options.
Multi-Tenant: Support multiple applications. Scalable architecture.
Social Login: Google, Facebook, GitHub. Easy onboarding.
User Management: Complete user lifecycle. Comprehensive control.
Themes: Customize login pages. Your brand.
